column2: Ingredients : mascarpone, coffee, sugar, cocoa, almond, egg, salt. Separate the egg whites from the yolks. In a bowl, whisk the egg yolks with sugar and add Marsala and Mascarpone. In another bowl, whisk the egg whites with a pinch of salt....

Ingredients : milk, egg, rum, caster sugar, vanilla sugar. Preheat oven to 180 째 C / 350 째F (gas mark 6). Boil the milk. In a bowl, beat the eggs with the sugar and the vanilla sugar. Add rum. Pour the boiling milk over the mixture. Pour into a mold...
